code: import*as yup from'yup';export var entranceSchema=yup.object().shape({installmentType:yup.string().required('請選擇欲申請之晚點付項目')});export var installmentItemSchema=yup.object().shape({installmentItem:yup.string().required('請選擇要分期消費的項目')});export var installmentNumberSchema=yup.object().shape({installmentNumber:yup.string().required('請選擇欲申請之晚點付期數')});
